text:
ALLEN MILLER 602 GLADSTONE STREET PULLMAN, WASHINGTON 99163
October 2, 1968
Mr. Robert D. Swezey, Secretary-Treasurer
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
1250 Connecticut Avenue N. W. - Suite 630
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Bob:
Enclosed is a copy of the draft proposal of a
questionnaire. In fact, three are. proposed.
The AM form which is given in detail'. Very
minor variations in it are contemplated for the
FM form. This questionnaire would go to all
FMs except the 10 watters.
Similar information will be sought from them^
but without reference to FCC forms. I antici¬
pate th© smallest percentage of response from
them and the least significance in their
answers.
Also enclosed is the proposed letter of trans¬
mittal. As I said on the phone, I hope for a
tabulation of results with some relevant com¬
ments for the November meeting of the CPB
Board.
Cordially yours.
am:m
ends (2)
